text: On 4 February 2025, a school shooting happened at , an adult education centre in Örebro, Sweden. Eleven people were killed, including the perpetrator, and six others injured. Reasons behind the attack are under investigation by the Swedish Police Authority and the Swedish Security Service. Six people were hospitalised. Swedish prime minister Ulf Kristersson said that it is the worst mass shooting in the country's history. the Swedish government and the Sweden Democrats unveiled plans to pass stricter regulations on firearms, including restricting access to semi-automatic weapons such as the AR-15. ==References== Category:2025 crimes in Europe Category:2020s in Sweden Category:2020s mass shootings in Europe Category:2020s murders in Europe Category:Mass murder in Europe Category:Mass murder in the 2020s Category:School shootings in Europe Category:Attacks on schools in Europe Category:Attacks on buildings and structures in the 2020s Category:February 2025 events Category:Örebro
title: 2025 Risbergska school shooting
